attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2010-0746

Date: 2010-06-10

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development and in accordance with the Saskatchewan Treaty Land Entitlement Framework Agreement, dated September 22, 1992, hereby

 

(a) pursuant to subsection 35(1) of the Indian Act, consents to the exercise by Saskatchewan Power Corporation and TransGas Limited (the Companies) of the power to take, without the consent of the owner, in accordance with Power Corporation Act, R.S.S., 1978 c. P-19 and SaskEnergy Act, S.S. 1992 c. S-35.1, the easements described in the easement agreements in the attached Schedules I and II, for electrical transmission system and natural gas transmission pipeline purposes, subject to the term that the easements be relinquished to Her Majesty in right of Canada when no longer required for the purposes specified in those agreements; and

 

(b) pursuant to subsection 35(3) of the Indian Act, in lieu of the Companies taking the easements as consented to in paragraph (a), authorizes the grant to the Companies of the easements described in the annexed easement agreements for the purposes specified in those agreements, subject to the term that the easements be relinquished to Her Majesty in right of Canada when no longer required for those purposes.


Sur recommandation du ministre des Affaires indiennes et du Nord canadien et conformément à l = accord intitulé Saskatchewan Treaty Land Entitlement Framework Agreement, daté du 22 septembre 1992, Son Excellence la Gouverneure générale en conseil :

 

a) en vertu du paragraphe 35(1) de la Loi sur les Indiens, consent à l’exercice par Saskatchewan Power Corporation et TransGas Limited (les sociétés) du pouvoir de prendre, sans le consentement du propriétaire, conformément à Power Corporation Act, R.S.S., 1978 c. P-19 et SaskEnergy Act, S.S. 1992 c.

S-35.1, les servitudes délimitées dans les accords de servitude figurant aux annexes I et II ci-jointes, pour les besoins d’un système de transmission d'électricité et d’un pipeline de transmission de gaz naturel, à la condition que ces servitudes soient délaissées en faveur de Sa Majesté du chef du Canada dès qu’elles cesseront d’être requises à ces fins ;

 

b) en vertu du paragraphe 35(3) de la Loi sur les Indiens, au lieu que les Sociétés prennent les servitudes en vertu du consentement prévu à l = alinéa a), autorise l’octroi aux sociétés conformément aux accords de servitude ci-joints et aux fins qui y sont précisées, à la condition qu’elles soient délaissées en faveur de Sa Majesté du chef du Canada dès qu’elles cesseront d’être requises à ces fins.

Her Excellency the Governor General in Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Indian Affairs and Northern Development and in accordance with the Saskatchewan Treaty Land Entitlement Framework Agreement, dated September 22, 1992, hereby


 


(a) pursuant to subsection 35(1) of the Indian Act, consents to the exercise by Saskatchewan Power Corporation and TransGas Limited (the Companies) of the power to take, without the consent of the owner, in accordance with Power Corporation Act, R.S.S., 1978 c. P-19 and SaskEnergy Act, S.S. 1992 c. S-35.1, the easements described in the easement agreements in the attached Schedules I and II, for electrical transmission system and natural gas transmission pipeline purposes, subject to the term that the easements be relinquished to Her Majesty in right of Canada when no longer required for the purposes specified in those agreements; and


 


(b) pursuant to subsection 35(3) of the Indian Act, in lieu of the Companies taking the easements as consented to in paragraph (a), authorizes the grant to the Companies of the easements described in the annexed easement agreements for the purposes specified in those agreements, subject to the term that the easements be relinquished to Her Majesty in right of Canada when no longer required for those purposes.
